page.title: 15Shiskine Clubs & Activities.
page.content:
{ {************************************* There are many different kinds of clubs in Shiskine and Blackwaterfoot. Local children go to clubs such as the Brownies, Beavers, Cubs, Guides and Youth club.
Local adults take part in valley in many clubs and activities such as, the S.W.R.I., Local village hall activities, darts, pool, bridge, local drama, island Gilbert & Sullivan Society, sub-aqua, squash, golf, tennis, bowling, summer football and cricket.
In the summer, tourists join in many of these activities, including pony treking and swimming. {**************************************
